Gel Seat Cushion rapidly and continuously disperse the pressure through the honeycomb to alleviate tailbone pain, sciatica during prolonged sitting sessions.

▶ Car Seat cushion - The seat cushion for car features a non-slip bottom, which keeps it securely in place, perfect for a wide variety of applications, including use as an office chair cushion, car seat cushion for driving, or a seat cushion for desk chair.

▶ Office Chair Cushion - Gel seat cushion is the perfect solution for adding comfort to your office chair or providing pressure relief for your tailbone. ▶ Seat Cushions for Family & Friends - You can always count on quality and durable of our gel chair cushions and give them as a gift for your family & friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great butt relief!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something to soften my office chair since I spend so much time on it. All I seemed find is memory foam this and memory foam that! I hate memory foam in anything! I ran across this pad almost by accident.This little pad is perfect! Very comfortable, supportive, and does not mash flat! If you are looking for something to make sitting in a office chair more comfortable I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I honestly thought it would be a little smaller, so definitely check the dimensions if you’re looking for something smaller. But I’m happy with it & it’s very comfortable 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and breathable, using it right now!
reviews.reviewText: I mainly wanted this because a leather chair and warm weather and wearing shorts sitting in a leather chair do not mix well, so I wasn't too concerned about the cushion. But this is very comfortable. I forgot I was even sitting on it. It's breathable so my skin isn't sweaty where it is touching the chair, it's quite comfortable. You feel the support without obviously feeling you are sitting on something extra. The non-slip at the bottom works very good, I actually had to lift the cushion to move it over, I couldn't just slide it with my hands. I'm very happy with this.
